moduleMeta.name: baseMaps
moduleMeta.author: longyinping11@lzb.ac.cn
moduleMeta.description: reading base maps like DEM, landuse, slope,etc.

var.name: demFile
var.description: the DEM file path

var.name: cellareaFile
var.description: the study area extent file path

var.name: slopeFile
var.description: the slope file path

var.name: slopeLengthFile
var.description: the hillslope element file path

var.name: slopeDegreeFile
var.description: the slope(in degree) file path

var.name: aspectFile
var.description: the aspect file path

var.name: soilTypesFile
var.description: the soil type file path

var.name: landuseFile
var.description: the landuse file path

var.name: basin2D
var.description: a 2D array that dipicts the study area extent

var.name: elevRaster
var.description: a raster object in which elevation of the study area and the header are saved

var.name: elev2D
var.description: elevation of the study area

var.name: slope2D
var.description: slope of the study area

var.name: slopeLength2D
var.description: length of each hillslope element in the study area

var.name: slopeDegree2D
var.description: slope(in degree) of the study area

var.name: aspect2D
var.description: aspect of the study area

var.name: soilcode2D
var.description: soiltype code at each grid of the study area

var.name: landcode2D
var.description: landuse code at at each grid of the study area

var.name: nrows
var.description: the nrows value in the ascii file

var.name: ncols
var.description: the ncols value in the ascii file

var.name: xllcorner
var.description: the xllcorner value in the ascii file

var.name: yllcorner
var.description: the yllcorner value in the ascii file

var.name: cellsize
var.description: the cellsize value in the ascii file

var.name: nodata
var.description: the nodata value in the ascii file
